data.text: @atti_cus Sir, we regret the unpleasant experience and completely understand that finding mosquitoes on-board is definitely discomforting. All our aircrafts undergo deep cleaning and fumigation before every flight departure and we take such feedback seriously. <1/2>
@tweetkarthikks Sir, we regret to see this and request you to DM us your Contact Number, so we may connect with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@DeepakPrasad246 Also, please be informed that we will share the feedback with the concerned team to have necessary review on this. ~Sheetal 2/2

@DeepakPrasad246 Mr Prasad, we understand that fragile tags are crucial as the fragile baggage needs to be handled with care and we always try to deliver the bag in the same condition at the destination point. Could you please confirm if the items in the bag are fine?  1/2
@Atulraj5964 Mr Raj, we request you to share the PNR via DM along with a snap of your ID Card, so we may check and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@firozinpol Sir, we can understand the agony here. Did you report this to the arrival staff at the airport? If yes, let us know via DM while we are looking into this. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@Satish_K94 Sir, our team will be glad to assist your parents. Please help us with the flight details via DM so we may forward the same to the concerned team at the airport. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@SabooParth Sir, we are sad to see you disappointed. Could you please share the PNR with us via DM so we may check with the relevant team. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@pragatimehra Ma'am, thank you for taking the time to connect with us and we truly regret your experience with our user interface. Our team is constantly working towards improving the same. Looking forward to your pleasant company on-board tomorrow. ~Yashica
@pradhangoud Mr Pradhan, we regret the hassle caused. Please know that our team is looking into it on priority and shall connect with you shortly after an update. ~Sheetal
@Cricket63564266 Hi, you may carry the dry sweets in your baggage. Let us know via DM if you have any queries. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@AnkitSi92672431 Mr Singh, we can understand the trouble of missing the flight. However, we would like to inform you that the check-in counter closes 60 mins and boarding gate closes 25 minutes prior. We request your understanding of the same. ~Sheetal
@adhi_kesarla Sir, this is not the kind of experience we wish you to have. Please share your PNR via DM so we may update you on this shortly. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Bundweiser Hi, we will look into this. Please help us with the PNR via DM so we may assist you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ashishbansal_in Mr Bansal, we regret to know about this. Please know that we are sharing the feedback with the concerned team for necessary review and action on this. ~Sheetal

@asutosh87 We wish ma'am a speedy recovery, Sir. Please be assured, our team will assist ma'am in the best way possible. We are also communicating her details to our team at Kolkata for further assistance. ~Yashica
@metejasboltoy Sir, we are concerned to know about this. Please know that we are sharing this with the relevant team for a review on this. ~Sheetal

@icykash Hi, we would like to inform you that up to 5ltrs with Alcoholic level between 24%-70% is allowed in check-in baggage. Please feel free to reach out to us via DM if any queries ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @meel_ankit Sir, we are connecting with our airport team immediately for assistance and regret the inconvenience. Our team does its utmost to not disrupt the travel plans of our flyers but at times, it is beyond our control. Your patience is highly appreciated during this interim. ~Yashica

@vipul_kp Sir, delays can be frustrating and we can only imagine the inconvenience it must have caused. Our team does its utmost to not disrupt the travel plans of our flyers, however, at times it is beyond our control. We hope to avoid such hold-ups in the future. ~Yashica
@Seema_Pr @CSMIA_Official We wish to look into this further and request you to DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF us your PNR so we can work on the best available alternatives for you. ~Yashica <2/2>

@Seema_Pr @CSMIA_Official Ms Pradhan, we understand your sentiment and truly value all of our customers. Our team does its best to accept marginally late flyers, but at the same time, we cannot keep our other flyers waiting. <1/2>
@vikrantpande Mr Pande, we regret your recent experience and will surely share your feedback with our airport team to work on such delays. We hope to serve you better in times to come. ~Yashica

data.text: @Themightybooper Sir, we request you to stay tuned to our social media pages for updates on advisory. You can also keep a tab on a particular flight using the link https://t.co/rpnOvAOxQl. ~Yashica

We understand that spotting mosquitoes onboard is definitely discomforting and we take such feedback seriously. urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @SauravDeka4 Sir, as checked, the flyers have already completed their web check-in. In order to make the changes, we request you to undo the web check-in for Mr Bikul Saikia using https://t.co/lTohySkQiz link and make the relevant changes. ~Yashica
@Shakeel830 Mr Khan, we request you to also share your PNR with us over DM so we can take a closer look and expedite this. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@KalangiRashida Ma'am we understand your concern and the disappointment. However, please know that minor wear and tear may occur during the loading and offloading of bags. Rest be assured, we have noted your feedback in this regard. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@rohitPandeyy Mr Pandey, we would like to look into this immediately and request you to share your PNR with us over DM. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @madhunandan Sir, we understand your disappointment. Pre-booked meals cannot be changed on board. Further we have noted your feedback. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@DrCtvs Dr Mehta, as checked, your web check-in has already been completed. The boarding pass along with the auto-assigned seat will be sent to the registered email id 12-3 hours prior to the time of scheduled departure. Looking forward to welcoming you on-board. ~Yashica
@iamrkrish Hi, please DM us your PNR and available contact number so we can connect with you and assist at the earliest. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text:
@HarshitModi90 Mr Modi, we have dimple cheeks after reading this and we'll certainly share your compliments with Anshika. It elates us to see our customers smile. Could you DM us your PNR as well so we can spread the joy with our teammate as well? ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@mukkupandey Sir, we believe that your concern has been addressed by our team. ~Prahlad

@ravidhingra_ Mr Dhingra, delays are challenging and can be very frustrating. We truly appreciate your patience this whole time and see that you are on your way. We hope to avoid such hold-ups in the future and hope you have a comfortable time in the air. ~Yashica

@patelhemals Mr Patel, we regret to note this and can only imagine how challenging this must be. Could you DM us your PNR so we can immediately connect with our team for further assistance? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@rajkgoelfca We understand your discomfort, sir. As checked the seat was non reclining seat causing no reclining. We look forward for your understanding. ~Diyashi
@DeepakTlWARl Mr Tiwari, we request you to DM us your PNR as well as the PIR issued by the arrival airport team, so we can take a closer look into this. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Iamayank1 Sir, please note, flight fares are ever-changing and are subject to increasing or decreasing at any given time as per the availability. We look forward to your understanding of the same. ~Yashica

@sandeep11221122 Sir, as such there is no such capacity defined for power bank charge, however, the power bank should not be of more than 100 Watt power. We hope this information was helpful. ~Yashica
@GraciasKeith Sir, we are highlighting this to our concerned team and appreciate you bringing this to our notice. We request your patience during this interim. ~Yashica
@dr_SubranilG It's always a great feeling to be home, Dr Ghosh. Enjoy your stay! 💙 #GoIndiGo ~Linda
@anindasardar Mr Sardar, please DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

data.text: @theAmitArya @makemytrip @MoCA_GoI @PMOIndia @JM_Scindia Hello, for all the visa related information, please visit https://t.co/o9sWZe52Ys . Do let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @nicks880 Mr Dubey, please visit https://t.co/k0w1oKbhtD to make changes to your booking. ~Linda
@RakshaAnand27 @aaideoghar Hello, could you please share your concern in detail via DM along with the PNR so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi
@suhasbaliga Mr Baliga, sorry to find you disappointed. Please DM us your concern a bit more in detail along with the PNR so we can assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@piyush_garg12 Hello, allow us some time to get it checked. ~Diyashi
@vishalr40839794 Hello, we are constantly expanding and adding new routes to our network. We have duly noted your suggestion and shall raise it with the concerned team. ~Diyashi
@nicks880 Mr Dubey, please know, that no one can travel, on behalf of some one else. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@LakshGurumurthy Sir, we understand your disappointment. As checked the flight got delayed due to late arrival of the aircraft. We look forward for your understanding. ~Diyashi

@baloni_priyanka @Ministry_CA As checked the 5 kgs extra baggage allowance was booked along with an extra piece of bag and the total baggage allowance exceeded. Therefore the exceeding amount was charged. We look forward for your understanding. ~Diyashi (2/2)
@baloni_priyanka @Ministry_CA Hello, we understand your disappointment. Please know    the ticketed baggage allowance per person is 15kgs of checked-in and 7 kgs of hand baggage. (1/2)
@AbhayJh93016882 Mr Jha, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. ~Linda
@iManishModi Hello, we have replied to you on DM kindly check. ~Diyashi
@BruceGuthrie We regret to hear this, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get the matter checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SupratikBhatt20 Mr Bhattacharjee, we regret to hear this. Could you please share your PNR so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi
@Curioussouya Hello, we are are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Flight Cancellation, Charges & FAQs - IndiGo
urls.description: Cancel your IndiGo flight or booking with the step by step guide to flight cancellation. Know the cancellation charges for domestic and international bookings.

data.text: @kevin4potus Hello, to know about the cancellation refund charges please visit https://t.co/u4WvNH5F7f. ~Diyashi
@sumu_rds11 We regret to hear this ma'am, could you please share the PNR via DM, so we may check and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @priya09sharma Ms Sharma, please visit https://t.co/MvCC9wfUlK to check the allowed and restricted items. ~Kritika
@hitesh_agarwal @DGCAIndia Mr Agarwal, we understand your disappointment. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi
@AlphaWings7877 We regret to hear this. Could you please share your concern in details via DM. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SitanathRath Sir, seats are allocated as per availability. Further, please DM us your PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@DrBhavin1381 Mr Mehta, sorry to note your disappointment. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@MuraliJagannat1 which is why we always ensure that the crew onboard can speak Hindi & English as per the standard operating procedures. However, your feedback is valuable to us and the same is well noted. ~Linda (2/2)

@MuraliJagannat1 Mr Jagannathan, we understand that it’s always great to hear & speak in the local language. That is why we try & include local language speakers as cabin crew on board. However, it may happen at times that our local language-speaking crew are aligned on different routes  (1/2)
@KalangiRashida We regret to see this. We always try to deliver the baggage in the same condition as it was. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you. ~Diyashi
@pavitverma Mr Verma, we'll get this checked. Meanwhile, you may DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
At IndiGo, we are all about breaking new grounds and exploring more opportunities, just like the very determined Sakshi. #goIndiGo #MadeinIndiGo https://t.co/6iXs7gBLhO
@kumar_akash1011 Yes, you can. ~Linda

@one_the_na Ms Sharma, please DM us the case reference number which you must have received as an acknowledgement of your email . You might as well send us a snapshot of the email wherein your email ID is visible so we can raise it with the concerned team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@harishdhamija86 Hello, we understand the disappointment. Allow us some time. We are getting the concern checked. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Visa Information to Travel Abroad | IndiGo
urls.description: Get updated information on visa and passport requirements for the countries you are visiting.

data.text: @tanveer83447909 Hello, 'Okay to board' message is required for all the customers acquiring the ECR passport and customers travelling with a print-out of the Labour and Work e-visa. To know more please visit https://t.co/C38XtjBVb7. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@neeraj12ka4 Mr Singh, this is unfortunate! Did you inform our airport team upon arrival? Please DM us in detail so we can assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@c11314 Mr Jain, please be informed, excess baggage for international connecting flights has to be pre-booked online up to 6 hrs prior to departure. ~Linda
@shubhambanerje1 Mr Banerjee, we regret the delay caused due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. We see the flight has already taken off. ~Linda
@ArioFly We are constantly expanding and adding new routes to our network. Your suggestion is duly noted and surely be shared. Stay tuned. ~Diyashi

@Mohan220475 Sir, please be informed, free baggage allowance is 01 piece of check-in baggage of 15 kilos. Anything above & beyond will incur cost. Do let us know via DM if you require any assistance. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@subho_m93 We regret the inconvenience, Mr Mukherjee. Could you please share your contact details via DM along with your query, so one of our team member may connect and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ThisNMore We regret to hear this. We never intend to provide such experience. Could your please share the PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

urls.title: Non-Standard Baggage, Special Baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: If you wish to carry big bags such as Golf Bags, Surf Boards Bags etc. then, IndiGo will levy a fee of INR 1200 (or equivalent in foreign currency) for Domestic flights and INR 2500 (or equivalent in foreign currency) for International flights.

data.text: @amituk0096 Mr Kumar, you may carry the same in your check-in baggage. Please visit https://t.co/4zszuCV0uW for more information. ~Diyashi

@133abhi Sir, we regret the delay caused due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. The revised departure is at 11;15 hrs. We see the boarding is in progress. Please hang in there while our team is expediting the process. ~Linda

@kamleshdgupta Mr Gupta, our free seats are limited & gets occupied quickly. You can always opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda

@Som_15 Mr Banerjee, did you try clearing the cache & cookies of the browser you're using? if not, do try it once. If the issue still persists, you may DM us your PNR along with the snapshot of the error you're encountering. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

data.text: @RanaBasu13 Sir. as checked meal was served, however, we regret the inconvenience. ~Prahlad

@Digvijay0709 Hello, you may carry the stroller till the boarding gate or gate of air craft and hand it over to our staff. They shall keep it with the check in baggage and deliver it to you on arrival at your destination. ~Diyashi
@think_re_ Mr Jain please know, the VBIR stands for Veg Biriyani, CCWT is chocolate chip cookies and TCSW is tomato cucumber cheese lettuce sandwich. Thank you. ~Diyashi

urls.title: FAQs About Infants Travelling in a Flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Read all the frequently asked questions about fee for infants on-board, baggage allowance & the age group of an infant. Explore complete FAQs at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @ankitbidawatka Sir, we wish to inform you that a single adult can carry only one infant. Please visit https://t.co/dRP9thuRGH for the infant travel related information. ~Diyashi
@Suresh01091977 Sir, we have replied to you via DM. Kindly check. ~Diyashi

@Naren80238193 Sir, sorry to note your disappointment. However, wheelchair inventory is limited up to 4 per flight & is added on first come first serve basis. However, we do try our best to accommodate wheelchair requests beyond the restriction. Further, your feedback is duly noted. ~Linda
@KamleshBabuBaj1 Hello, could you explain your concern in details via DM, so we may assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@cz_binance_6LH_ Hi, we believe you have received your baggage. Do let us know for any other assistance. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@JoravarSingh123 Sir, as checked we haven't received the payment for 5 kilos excess baggage. Any amount deducted will be auto refunded to the same mode of payment within 5-7 working days. ~Linda
@madhunandan We regret to hear this, sir. Allow us some time we are getting the matter checked. ~Diyashi
@TweetsBangalore We regret the delay. Due to poor weather conditions the flight got delayed. And shall be departing soon. Hope you have a pleasant journey. ~Diyashi
